    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4

    Facet Transportation_Summary

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:Transportation_ID
        • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:Transportation_Summary

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<Transportation description="Example String Value" includedInd="true" notificationRequired="Example String Value" objID="transportation_1" typicalTravelTime="PT1004199059S" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4">
    <Identifier organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">guid12345</Identifier>
    <TransportationRef>transportation_1</TransportationRef>
    <Type>Bicycle</Type>
    <MultimediaCollection lastUpdated="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00">
        <MultimediaText caption="Example String Value" language="en" lastUpdated="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" objID="multimedia_1" version="Example String Value">
            <Category>Ballroom</Category>
            <AdditionalDetailType>Advanced booking information</AdditionalDetailType>
            <InfoType>Address</InfoType>
            <TextCategory caption="Example String Value" category="2" removalInd="true">
                <Text language="en" textFormat="PlainText">Formatted text example.</Text>
            </TextCategory>
        </MultimediaText>
    </MultimediaCollection>
    <OperationSchedule additionalOperationInfoCode="2" daysOfWeek="Monday Tuesday Wednesday" frequency="Example String Value" text="Example String Value">
        <DateTimeSpanWindowsDetail>
            <TimeSpan end="2016-08-28T04:32:52Z" start="2016-08-22T19:32:52Z"/>
            <StartWindow end="2016-08-28T04:32:52Z" start="2016-08-22T19:32:52Z"/>
            <EndWindow end="2016-08-28T04:32:52Z" start="2016-08-22T19:32:52Z"/>
            <Duration>PT130S</Duration>
            <DurationUnit>SUN</DurationUnit>
        </DateTimeSpanWindowsDetail>
    </OperationSchedule>
    <Description>Example String Value</Description>
    <ChargeUnit>Per unit</ChargeUnit>
    <CurrencyAmount currencyCode="USD" minorUnit="2">80000</CurrencyAmount>
    <AddressDetail language="en" role="Home" validInd="true">
        <AddressLine>111 Travers St, Dun Laoghaire Co. Dublin Ireland</AddressLine>
        <BldgRoom buldingInd="true">Bldg H</BldgRoom>
        <Number pO_Box="98567499" ruralRouteNmbr="88" streetDirection="NNW" streetNmbrSuffix="B">563</Number>
        <Street>Travers Street</Street>
        <City>Dublin</City>
        <County>Fairfax</County>
        <StateProv name="Texas">TX</StateProv>
        <Country name="Ireland">IR</Country>
        <PostalCode>32165-9999</PostalCode>
        <Remark>This address should be used for all official correspondences.</Remark>
        <Privacy optInDate="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" optInStatus="OptedIn" optOutDate="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" shareMarketInd="Yes" shareSyncInd="No"/>
        <Type>Business</Type>
        <Use>Billing</Use>
    </AddressDetail>
    <LocationCode city="Lancaster" codeContext="Example String Value" country="US" stateProvince="PA">Example String Value</LocationCode>
</Transportation>

      Example JSON

      {
  "TransportationSummary" : {
    "objID" : "transportation_1",
    "notificationRequired" : "Example String Value",
    "description" : "Example String Value",
    "typicalTravelTime" : "PT1004199059S",
    "includedInd" : true,
    "Identifier" : {
      "value" : "guid12345",
      "url" : "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema",
      "system" : "sysABC3344",
      "organization" : "Acme"
    },
    "TransportationRef" : "transportation_1",
    "Type" : {
      "value" : "Bicycle"
    },
    "MultimediaCollection" : {
      "@type" : "MultimediaCollection",
      "lastUpdated" : "2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00",
      "Multimedia" : [ {
        "@type" : "MultimediaText",
        "objID" : "multimedia_1",
        "lastUpdated" : "2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00",
        "version" : "Example String Value",
        "language" : "en",
        "caption" : "Example String Value",
        "Category" : {
          "value" : "Ballroom"
        },
        "AdditionalDetailType" : {
          "value" : "Advanced booking information"
        },
        "InfoType" : {
          "value" : "Address"
        },
        "TextCategory" : {
          "@type" : "TextCategory",
          "category" : "2",
          "caption" : "Example String Value",
          "removalInd" : true,
          "Text" : [ {
            "value" : "Formatted text example.",
            "language" : "en",
            "textFormat" : "PlainText"
          } ]
        }
      } ]
    },
    "OperationSchedule" : [ {
      "@type" : "OperationSchedule",
      "daysOfWeek" : [ "Monday", "Tuesday", "Wednesday" ],
      "additionalOperationInfoCode" : "2",
      "frequency" : "Example String Value",
      "text" : "Example String Value",
      "DateTimeSpanWindows" : {
        "@type" : "DateTimeSpanWindowsDetail",
        "TimeSpan" : {
          "value" : null,
          "start" : "2016-08-22T19:32:52Z",
          "end" : "2016-08-28T04:32:52Z"
        },
        "StartWindow" : {
          "value" : null,
          "start" : "2016-08-22T19:32:52Z",
          "end" : "2016-08-28T04:32:52Z"
        },
        "EndWindow" : {
          "value" : null,
          "start" : "2016-08-22T19:32:52Z",
          "end" : "2016-08-28T04:32:52Z"
        },
        "Duration" : [ "PT130S" ],
        "DurationUnit" : {
          "value" : "SUN"
        }
      }
    } ],
    "Description" : "Example String Value",
    "ChargeUnit" : {
      "value" : "Per unit"
    },
    "CurrencyAmount" : {
      "value" : 80000,
      "currencyCode" : "USD",
      "minorUnit" : 2
    },
    "Address" : {
      "@type" : "AddressDetail",
      "role" : "Home",
      "language" : "en",
      "validInd" : true,
      "AddressLine" : [ "111 Travers St, Dun Laoghaire Co. Dublin Ireland" ],
      "BldgRoom" : [ {
        "value" : "Bldg H",
        "buldingInd" : true
      } ],
      "Number" : {
        "value" : "563",
        "streetNmbrSuffix" : "B",
        "streetDirection" : "NNW",
        "ruralRouteNmbr" : "88",
        "pO_Box" : "98567499"
      },
      "Street" : "Travers Street",
      "City" : "Dublin",
      "County" : "Fairfax",
      "StateProv" : {
        "value" : "TX",
        "name" : "Texas"
      },
      "Country" : {
        "value" : "IR",
        "name" : "Ireland"
      },
      "PostalCode" : "32165-9999",
      "Remark" : "This address should be used for all official correspondences.",
      "Privacy" : {
        "value" : null,
        "shareMarketInd" : "Yes",
        "shareSyncInd" : "No",
        "optInStatus" : "OptedIn",
        "optInDate" : "2011-12-05T06:00:00Z",
        "optOutDate" : "2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00"
      },
      "Type" : {
        "value" : "Business"
      },
      "Use" : {
        "value" : "Billing"
      }
    },
    "LocationCode" : {
      "value" : "Example String Value",
      "city" : "Lancaster",
      "stateProvince" : "PA",
      "country" : "US",
      "codeContext" : "Example String Value"
    }
  }

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        Type
        The mode of transportation. Refer to OpenTravel Code List Transportation Code (TRP).
        Details
        Type Transportation_Enum
        Example Value Bicycle
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        MultimediaCollection
        Multimedia information about the transportation.
        Details
        Type MultimediaCollection
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        OperationSchedule
        Collection of operation schedules for the transportation.
        Details
        Type OperationSchedule
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 30
        Description
        Descriptive text that describes the transportation.
        Details
        Type StringLong
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        ChargeUnit
        Refer to OpenTravel Codelist Charge Type (CHG).
        Details
        Type ChargeUnit_Enum
        Example Value Per unit
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        CurrencyAmount
        The currency amount of the tranportation charge.
        Details
        Type CurrencyAmount
        Example Value 80000
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        Address
        The address of the transportation.
        Details
        Type Address
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        LocationCode
        The location code of the transportation Identifier of the arrival or delivery point (e.g., airport code)
        Details
        Type LocationCode
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Properties inherited from http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:Transportation_ID

        Identifier, TransportationRef

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        notificationRequired
        This would be used for information such as a shuttle needs to be requested or a reservation is required.
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        description
        Descriptive information about the mode of transportation.
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        typicalTravelTime
        The normal (average) travel time required to get to or from the location, measured in minutes.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:duration
        Example Value PT1004199059S
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Attributes inherited from http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:Transportation_ID

        objID

      • Indicator Summary

        Indicators 
        Name Description
        includedInd
        When true there is no additional charge for transportation.
